name: EA SPORTS FIFA Soccer 12
description:
Compete for awards throughout every game mode and unlock the most coveted players to create your dream club of superstars to compete for your city against teams from neighbouring cities.

Features

• FIFA City: See your City grow as you compete in every game mode.
• Streets to Stadium (Be A Pro): Put yourself in the game with Create Player
• Be A Manger: Take your favorite club to the top of the league tables
• Tournament Mode: Test your skills in a variety of offline tournaments.
